sentence.Network_en: They lose their entitle-ment to benefit when they start work.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们一开始工作就失去了获得救济金的资格。

sentence.Network_en: If the warranty is limited, the terms may entitle you to a replacement or refund.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果保修有限制，根据条款你也许可以要求退换或者退款。

sentence.Network_en: Golden parachutes entitle them to a full year's salary if they get booted out of the company.
sentence.Network_cn: 一旦被公司解雇，“金降落伞”协议使他们有权领取相当于一整年的薪水。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (formerly also as intitle): via Old French from late Latin intitulare, from in- 'in' + Latin titulus 'title'

entry.def: If you are entitled to something, you have the right to have it or do it.

example.ex: If the warranty is limited, the terms may entitle you to a replacement or refund...
example.tran: 如果保修有限制，根据条款你也许可以要求退换或者退款。

example.ex: They are entitled to first class travel...
example.tran: 他们可以坐头等舱旅行。

entry.tran: 给（书、电影、绘画等）命名；给…题名
entry.def: If the title of something such as a book, film, or painting is, for example, 'Sunrise', you can say that it is entitled 'Sunrise'.

example.ex: Chomsky's review is entitled 'Psychology and Ideology'.
example.tran: 乔姆斯基的这篇评论题为《心理学与意识形态》。

sentences.sentence: "The Freedom of Information Act entitles you to request your FBI file"

means.word_mean: 3. give a title to someone; make someone a member of the nobility

auth_sentence.content: Today equality seems to entitle everyone to express emotions as opinions.
auth_sentence.res_content: Today equality seems to entitle everyone to express emotions as opinions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Today equality seems to entitle everyone to express emotions as opinions.

auth_sentence.content: Membership fees often entitle people to reduced hire rates for tennis courts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Membership fees often entitle people to reduced hire rates for tennis courts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Membership fees often entitle people to reduced hire rates for tennis courts.

auth_sentence.content: While Skeem and Cooke are entitle to their position, they can only present it with the proper scientific evidence to back it up.
auth_sentence.res_content: While Skeem and Cooke are entitle to their position, they can only present it with the proper scientific evidence to back it up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: While Skeem and Cooke are entitle to their position, they can only present it with the proper scientific evidence to back it up.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+title标题,头衔→v. 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+wrap包裹→v.包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注

Sentence.sentence: I thought it was quite interesting, but I don't quite understand the column entitled change.
Famous people are entitled to a few failings, like the rest of us.
It entitles workers to as much as 12 weeks' unpaid leave for care of a newborn or dealing with a family medical problem.
In a report entitled "Averting the Old Age Crisis", it argued that pension arrangements in most countries were unsustainable.

sentences.en: He entitled us to enter his office at any time.
sentences.cn: 他授权给我们可以随时进入他的办公室。

sentences.en: They are entitled to enjoy many advantages and privileges.
sentences.cn: 他们有资格享有许多优惠和特权。

sentences.en: He entitled the book The Secret Garden.
sentences.cn: 他把这本书定名为《秘密花园》。

jushi.english: He entitled the book The Secret Garden .
jushi.chinese: 他把这本书定名为《秘密花园》。

jushi.english: The new magazine was entitled The World Screen .
jushi.chinese: 这本新杂志被命名为《环球荧屏》。

jushi.english: The poem is entitled Ode to Skylark .
jushi.chinese: 这首诗的题目是《云雀颂》。
